title: Cannot Connect to Server and DC's from game
body:
Black screen on loading game, get a "Cannot connect to server" message.

On the rare chance I do get into a game, get constant disconnections.

Has only started happening today.

Troubleshooting has not helped, and nothing has changed client side. Other players in games I can connect to report the same issue starting today.

replies.body:
Hi guys,

There was an issue earlier tonight with one of the providers that many ISPs use to reach the League game servers (IX Australia), which happened earlier tonight - [thread here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/FErIFkEZ-march-31st-2016-server-issue).  As fallout from this issue it looks like some players are having lingering problems with their connections despite the root cause being fixed.

I'd expect that as your ISPs reconfigure their routing following the fix, this should resolve itself but not all have done so at this point. 

Cheers
Mindstar

Thank you Agent Mindstar,

Thank you for being so diligent in your duties, now we know the questions to ask when we call our providers tomorrow if they are still to remedy the situation.

All the best, Have a great weekend!
We've made a change on our side of things that might help out - can you possibly check in a custom game and let me know if you can connect?
Not sure what the change was, but my ping of a constant 92-110 has dropped to range from 85--90. I like it :D

I've tried to make a custom game but the issue still remains, thanks for making the effort to fix the problem so late at night! Hopefully it gets fixed up tomorrow, if not I'll make a call and notify my ISP about the problem.
Hmmm.... I also use iPrimus.... have we deciphered the code?
hmm gg iprumus. if you guys find a fix let me know please.

Just tried to call them on their tech support line, 1300 85 11 85 but apparently they're shut at 11pm eastern... I'm in Perth so a long way behind.  I will call them tomorrow after work, but that will be late so if you'd like to do that earlier and let us know here that'd be great too :) Cheers
Me and my mrs cant get on at the moment either we use iprimus also.

Same thing just happened to me, maybe can figure out by comparing settings?

I've turned my firewall off, restarted router, restarted PC, flush dns ect.

My ISP is Iprimus and I'm using a netgear router
